name: Region of the Divine
description:
Place marks in the wild to balance your divine region

Rules

Goal - Use cards to place marks in regions to gain victory points. The game ends after 6 turns. 

Regions - Each region contains a number of Trees, Bunnies and Wolves. Each turn the number will change base on the weather. Regions start with different weather conditions and marks can add to combine different weather conditions. In a  grass neutral region each one will grow +1.  In the other weather one of the resources will grow +1

  • Rain - Trees grow +1
  • Heat - Bunnies grow +1
  • Winter -  Wolves grow +1

If bunnies are greater then trees or if wolves are greater then bunnies they will consume more and decrease the other with -2 each round. If there isn’t enough Trees or Bunnies some of them will die -2 instead of multiplying.

Cards - You start the game with 3 cards and get 2 more each turn. Pick the card and place the marker on the landscape. The mark will affect each region that it's overlapping.

Bonfire - Bonfire consumes x plants in each region it overlaps and adds 1 VP for each region. X+1 each turn, if x is less than available plants it’s destroyed.
